title.narrative: Ghana - Projet de réhabilitation de la Route Tema-Aflao (Tronçon Akatsi – Aflao)
Ghana - Tema-Aflao Road Rehabilitation Project (Akatsi – Aflao Section)

description.narrative: The objective of the project is to promote regional integration as well as contribute towards the Governments goal of poverty reduction and economic development by reducing the travel time and vehicle operating cost, resulting in reduced road user costs for both passengers and freight.

mailing-address.narrative: African Development Bank Group Headquarters Avenue Joseph Anoma 01 BP 1387 Abidjan 01, Côte d'Ivoire
